message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $110. This is a high-quality item worth more than $120 to us, and we believe it's a great value for you at this price considering its worth to you is $100.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $95 for it, considering my budget and the fact that I can get a similar product from John for $100.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering your willingness to pay $95, I am willing to accept that amount for our premium product. This allows us both to reach an agreeable solution.
